_source.text: A Burgundy wine tasting and I was not invited..they do call me Mr. Pinot...you could have least let me smell them down the phone.I drank a Musigny Joseph Drouhin 2000 last year which was perhaps a little better than your 2000..which is a highly rated vintage..and it still needed to fill out...it was missing that 'UMPHF' in the middle flavour.
